title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.64 - Consolidation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 65.64 - Consolidation

State Regulations

Proceedings may be consolidated where there are common
questions of law or fact, or both, or in other appropriate circumstances, on
the application of any party by filing a motion in the same manner as a motion
addressed to the pleading, or by the Board's own motion. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
65.64

Adopted

New

York State Register March 30, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 13, eff. 3/30/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
